record.jsxtext: CDF record id for the affected row
the index of the column that received the execute action

record.jsxtip: fires after the cell selection has changed but only if the cell has no edit mask

record.jsxtext: CDF record id for the selected item, null if a deselection event
the index of the column that received the select action, null if a deselection event
CDF record id for the row to be dragged
CDF record id for the row to be dragged, same as strDRAGID
the index of the column where the drag originated
JSX object where the DRAG began
CDF record of the dragged row
CDF record id for the row that received the drop
the index of the column that received the the drop
whether the source of the dragged CDF record will allow the adoption

record.jsxtip: fires before a drop event when the ctrl key is held down

record.jsxtext: JSX object where the DRAG began
CDF record of the dragged row
CDF record id for the row that received the drop
the index of the column that received the the drop
whether the source of the dragged CDF record will allow the adoption

record.jsxtip: fires before a record from this object is adopted by another object

record.jsxtext: JSX Object instance, source of adopted record
the CDF id of the record to adopt
JSX Object instance, target of adopted record
true if control drop, false otherwise

record.jsxtip: fires before a spyglass is displayed; should eval to the HTML content of the spyglass

record.jsxtext: CDF record id for the spied row
the index of the column that received the spy

record.jsxtip: fires before a context menu is shown

record.jsxtext: CDF record id for the affected row
the index of the column that received the menu action

record.jsxreturntext: use this field to override the default menu with an instance of jsx3.gui.Menu

record.jsxtip: fires before the list/grid is sorted

record.jsxtext: the index of the column just clicked
record.jsxreturntext: use this field to sort on a column other than the one that the user clicked on

record.jsxtip: fires after the list/grid is sorted

record.jsxtext: the index of the column that the list was sorted on

record.jsxtip: fires before a column is resized

record.jsxtext: JSX Object about to be resized
the index of the column being resized

record.jsxtip: fires after a column is resized

record.jsxtext: JSX Object that was just resized
the index of the column being resized

record.jsxreturntext: use this field to set the resulting column width to a value other than the width at which the user released the mouse

record.jsxtip: fires before a new CDF record is added

record.jsxtext: CDF record to append (as JavaScript object)

record.jsxtip: fires after a CDF record and TR were added

record.jsxtext: CDF record to append (as JavaScript object)
native HTML object reference to new element

record.jsxtip: fired when an editable cell gets focus

record.jsxtext: CDF record id for the affected row
handle to edit mask instance (JSX object)
the index of the affected column

record.jsxtip: fires before an edit is committed

record.jsxtext: CDF record id for the affected row
handle to edit mask instance (JSX object)
the HTML Table cell (TD) in the view
the index of the affected column

record.jsxtip: fires when the item has just been removed from the DOM

record.jsxtext: JSX Object that is in the process of being destroyed
the parent of this JSX Object before it was removed from the DOM tree
